trans-unit.source: Create a resource group in the specified subscription.
trans-unit.target: Create a resource group in the specified subscription.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="8d088ecc-26eb-42e9-8acc-fe929ed33563#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to resource groups.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="8d088ecc-26eb-42e9-8acc-fe929ed33563#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to resource groups.

trans-unit.source: Replace {resource-group-name} with the name that you want assigned to the resource group.
trans-unit.target: Replace {resource-group-name} with the name that you want assigned to the resource group.

trans-unit.source: {resource-group-name} must uniquely identify the resource group within the subscription.
trans-unit.target: {resource-group-name} must uniquely identify the resource group within the subscription.

trans-unit.source: It must be no longer than 80 characters long.
trans-unit.target: It must be no longer than 80 characters long.

trans-unit.source: It can contain only alphanumeric characters, dash, underscore, opening parenthesis, closing parenthesis, and period.
trans-unit.target: It can contain only alphanumeric characters, dash, underscore, opening parenthesis, closing parenthesis, and period.

trans-unit.source: The name cannot end with a period.
trans-unit.target: The name cannot end with a period.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the supported Azure location for the resource group.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the supported Azure location for the resource group.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="68b2ad0f-e4d5-472b-b5e4-680bdd439fd1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List all of the available data center locations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="68b2ad0f-e4d5-472b-b5e4-680bdd439fd1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List all of the available data center locations</link>.

trans-unit.source: This is the location where templates are deployed from.
trans-unit.target: This is the location where templates are deployed from.

trans-unit.source: A resource group in one location can contain a resource that is in a different location.
trans-unit.target: A resource group in one location can contain a resource that is in a different location.

trans-unit.source: After a resource group has been created in a location, it can’t be moved to another location.
trans-unit.target: After a resource group has been created in a location, it can’t be moved to another location.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a collection of one or more name and value pairs that describe a tag.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a collection of one or more name and value pairs that describe a tag.

trans-unit.source: The value can be null for a tag.
trans-unit.target: The value can be null for a tag.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the identifying URL of the resource group.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the identifying URL of the resource group.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the resource group.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the resource group.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the supported Azure location of the resource group.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the supported Azure location of the resource group.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the resource tags and their values that are used by the resource group.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the resource tags and their values that are used by the resource group.

trans-unit.source: This element is not returned if tags were not included in the request.
trans-unit.target: This element is not returned if tags were not included in the request.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the current provisioning state of the resource group.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the current provisioning state of the resource group.

trans-unit.source: When a resource group is successfully created, the value of the element is <languageKeyword>Succeeded</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: When a resource group is successfully created, the value of the element is <languageKeyword>Succeeded</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: If a template deployment is being created, this value can change depending on the status of the deployment.
trans-unit.target: If a template deployment is being created, this value can change depending on the status of the deployment.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="bd5a7cfd-f1b0-4f1d-8398-657a270e68f6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create a template deployment</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="bd5a7cfd-f1b0-4f1d-8398-657a270e68f6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create a template deployment</link>.
